title: Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) Design and Application for Real-World Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Cultivation of mathematical problem-solving skills using smartphone-based VR simulations in limited technological environments (no PC ownership). Gradual technology adoption considering practical applicability in educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model real-life problems (e.g., financial calculations, spatial measurements) using smartphone-based VR simulation tools.
Learners can apply complex mathematical concepts through collaborative problem-solving in technology-enhanced learning environments.
Learners can establish criteria to evaluate the practical applicability of TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) tools in resource-constrained technological environments.

resources: Teacher's TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) Tool Integration Manual
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
